summary: BRAKES DO NOT FUNCTION PROPERLY DURING WET WEATHER OF WHEN THE VEHICLE HIT A POTHOLE.  THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER WERE CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THERE WAS NOTHING THAT THEY COULD DO. THE CONSUMER HAS PAID OVER $200.00 TO GET BRAKES FIXED,  AND THE PROBLEM STILL EXISTED. CURRENTLY SPENT $250 FOR NEW ROTORS.     *NLM.....*AK
